data.title: Start Round Orb From Screens to A Main
data.description: Use this orb lineup a little bit before the barrier drops for a standard smoke at A Main.

data.title: Start Round One Way Orb For Mail
data.description: Throw your orb when the barrier drops like so, for a strong one way that prevents any Attackers from taking B Heaven control easily.

data.title: Start Round One Way Orb For B Main
data.description: Throw your orb when the barrier drops like so, for a powerful one way at B Main. This is more effective when you are on top of the small barrels back site.
